content.webTitle: Rugby World Cup team guide: Argentina

fields.headline: Argentina
fields.bodyText: Pedigree and form High point remains 1999, when they beat Ireland in Lens to make the quarter-final; otherwise the Pumas have always gone out at the pool stage - last time by a painful single point to . . . Ireland. Ranked six in the world. How they see it Victory last autumn over England and four wins in five outings against France plus a desperate desire for international recognition suggest they could roll over either France or the Irish to get into the knock-out phase. The coach Marcelo Loffreda has given his side polish in spite of meagre resources and limited preparation time. Heads for Leicester once the tournament is over. The captain Agustin Pichot, once of Bristol, now of Stade Français, is a great leader off the pitch - he was a key mover in a dispute last year with their federation over playing terms - as well as a livewire scrum-half. The linchpin Tipped to be one of the men of the tournament, Juan Martin Hernandez was full-back of the year of the last French domestic season. Brings versatility and inspiration to a side noted mainly for powerful forward play. How they'll play More to their game these days than that forward power and a big boot at No10, but the occasional bit of synchronised grunting won't hurt and Federico Todeschini can kick. Key fact Pichot's name means "little" in Occitan, a language spoken in southern France and parts of Spain and Italy. Omen Argentina beat Ireland in their only previous meeting in France, a 1999 World Cup quarter-final play-off. World Cup odds 66-1 The squad Forwards Patricio Albacete age 26, 21 caps Rimas Alvarez 33, 33 Marcos Ayerza 24, 13 Martin Durand 31, 51 Ignacio Fernandez Lobbe 32, 59 Juan Martín Fernandez Lobbe 25, 15 Santiago Gonzalez Bonarino 32, 11 Omar Hasan 36, 58 Mario Ledesma 34, 59 Juan Manuel Leguizamon 24, 17 Gonzalo Longo 33, 47 Esteban Lozada 25, 4 Lucas Ostiglia 31, 27 Rodrigo Roncero 30, 23 Martin Scelzo 31, 40 Martin Schusterman 31, 16 Alberto Vernet Basualdo 25, 6 Backs Horacio Agulla 22, 7 Lucas Borges 27, 20 Felipe Contepomi 30, 53 Manuel Contepomi 30, 32 Ignacio Corleto 29, 32 Nicolás Fernández Miranda 34, 43 Juan Martín Hernández 25, 23 José María Núñez Piossek 29, 27 Agustin Pichot capt, 33, 66 Hernán Senillosa 29, 28 Federico Serra Miras 27, 10 Gonzalo Pedro Tiesi 22, 11 Federico Todeschini 32, 16
